document_data.name: Control Undead
document_data.mainbody: '''''Control undead''''' was a type of [[giant]] rune.
document_data.Effects: Once activated this rune allowed the caster to control nearby [[undead]] creatures.
document_data.Components: Like most giant runes, it required no [[material component]]s, though the caster needed to know the rune ''[[blinding light]]'' in order to cast it. The process of shaping this rune could take anywhere from one to eight hours.
